name: template-load-example
description: Beefree SDK template load/save example with React, TypeScript & Prisma

scripts.dev: yarn db:ensure && concurrently "cd api && yarn dev" "cd web && yarn dev"
scripts.start: yarn db:ensure && concurrently "cd api && yarn dev" "cd web && yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd api && yarn build" "cd web && yarn build"
